dcterms:description: The EUPPBench dataset includes medium-range ensemble forecasts from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) along with corresponding station observations over an extended period for multiple lead times. It spans from 1997 to 2018 and includes 122 weather stations in Europe, containing both reforecasts and operational forecasts.
dcterms:title: EUPPBench
